sentences: Stefano di Battista (born February 14, 1969) is an Italian jazz musician who plays soprano and alto saxophone.
In Italy he received guidance from Massimo Urbani and by his twenties di Battista was performing in Paris.
He put out his debut as a leader in 1997 and has toured with the Elvin Jones Jazz Machine.
Giu' La Testa with Sylvain Luc (Just Looking, 2014)
